com.microsoft.azure.storage

Class SharedAccessPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.SharedAccessPolicy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedAccessAccountPolicy, SharedAccessBlobPolicy, SharedAccessFilePolicy, SharedAccessQueuePolicy, SharedAccessTablePolicy

    public abstract class SharedAccessPolicy
extends Object
    Represents a shared access policy, which specifies the start time, expiry time, and permissions for a shared access signature.

      SharedAccessPolicy()
      Creates an instance of the SharedAccessPolicy class.
